products.title: Chenille Chic Pearl Roman Blind
products.description: Looking for something warm, cosy and light? Then you've come to exactly the right place. This wonderful chenille chic fabric is incredibly plush and luxuriously soft to create a homely space. The light colourway is also great for keeping your home feeling open and spacious and, o looking for something warm, cosy and light? Then you've come to exactly the right place.

products.title: Plush Chenille Ivory Roman Blind
products.description: Soft as can be and incredibly light, this plush ivory roman blind has a velvety touch. It's picked out in the loveliest of light cream colourways too, softness all round. This is perfect for creating a comfy space for you to relax in. The colourway will keep you incredibly calm w soft as can be and incredibly light, this plush ivory roman blind has a velvety touch.

products.title: Luxe Chenille Smoke Roman Blind
products.description: So exactly what makes the tuiss luxe chenille so different to their standard chenille? Well its thicker for starters, and the sheen is more sophisticated, or understated if youd prefer. The texture is greater too, adding a greater cosy vibe to your home.
